list.name: Default
list.comment: Simplified resource.html file and added two magazine templates with better documentation. The earlier templates are not updated yet to be used with the new resource file.

task.summary: Vendor assets precompilation and added support for multi-article magazine
Changed the location of treesaver files to be directly under the corresponding directories inside assets directory.
Simplified resource.html file and added two magazine templates with better documentation. The earlier templates are not updated yet to be used with the new resource file.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Simplified resource.html file and added two magazine templates with better documentation. The earlier templates are not updated yet to be used with the new resource file.

MESSAGE.value: Vendor assets precompilation and added support for multi-article magazine
Changed the location of treesaver files to be directly under the corresponding directories inside assets directory.
Added support for HTML rendering for the text of articles.
Simplified resource.html file and added two magazine templates with better documentation. The earlier templates are not updated yet to be used with the new resource file.
